Name: ARR Change
Description: ARR - Previous ARR

Name: Previous ARR
Description: The ARR from the related previous deal (set to 0 for New Business deals or populated via workflow for Expansion, Renewal, Downgrade, or Cancellation deals).

Name: Previous Line Item ID
Description:
Links the current line item to the most recent prior line from which it was sourced. These initially would be blank if net new, win-back, cross-sell.
Data Source: Workflow

Name: Root Line Item ID
Description:
Identifies the original line item where the ARR first originated, regardless of how many renewals or changes have occurred since. These initially would be blank if net new, win-back, cross-sell.
Data Source: Workflow

Name: Billing Start Date
Description: The date when billing begins for the deal.

Name: Service End Date
Description:
When the service ends for the deal or line item (product).
Data Source: Workflow - Calculated as Service Start Date + Term + Billing frequency.
Usages: Inbounddb lists (1); Automation platform flow (1); Report (2); Dataset (6)

Name: Service Start Date
Description: When the service starts for the deal or line item (product).

Name: Create date
Description: The date the line item was created

Name: Deal Type
Options: Net New (newbusiness); Renewal (existingbusiness); Upsell; Downgrade; Cross-sell; Partial Churn; Cancellation; Non-Contracted Services; Win-back; Leads [HIDDEN]; Consolidated (Leader Tracker) [HIDDEN]; Expansion (expansionbusiness) [HIDDEN]; Ads; PLG

Name: Description
Description: Full description of product

Name: Allow buyer selected quantity
Description: Whether buyer selected quantity is to be enabled or not for a LineItem

Name: Created by user ID
Description: The user who created this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Object create date/time
Description: The date and time at which this object was created. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

Name: External line item id
Description: The ID of a line item

Name: Image URL
Description: Product images.

Name: Last Modified Date
Description: The date any property on this product was modified

Name: Currency
Description: Currency code for the line item.

Name: Merged record IDs
Description: The list of record IDs that have been merged into this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Record ID
Description: The unique ID for this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Record source detail 1
Description: First level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source detail 2
Description: Second level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source detail 3
Description: Third level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source
Description: How this record was created.

Name: Product type
Description: The type of product. By default, categorize your product as either Inventory, Non-Inventory or Service.

Name: SKU
Description: Unique product identifier

Name: Tax category
Description: The tax category used to determine what amount of tax to automatically apply to this line item

Name: Updated by user ID
Description: The user who last updated this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: URL
Description: Product url.

Name: Variant id of the product
Description: Variant id of the shopify product

Name: Owner assigned date
Description: The most recent timestamp of when an owner was assigned to this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Owner
Description: The owner of the object.

Name: Owner's main team
Description: The main team of the record owner. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Name
Description: Product name
Usages: Rollup property (2); Inbounddb lists (2); Automation platform flow (2); Report (5); Dataset (6)

Name: Product Category
Description: A custom field is used to group product SKUs (e.g., "Pray Radio," "Pray TV", “Pray Studio). It simplifies filtering, reporting, and sales analysis by organizing products into meaningful categories.
Options: PRAY Radio (Pray Radio); PRAYStudio Base (Pray Studio); PRAY TV (PrayTV); PRAY CAAS (Pray CaaS); SuperFunnel (Super Funnel); PRAYStudio AI Tools; Other
Usages: Rollup property (1); Automation platform flow (4); Dataset (5)

Name: Net price
Description: The amount of a line item

Name: Unit discount
Description: The discount amount applied

Name: Annual contract value
Description: The annual contract value (ACV) of this product

Name: Annual recurring revenue
Description: The annual recurring revenue (ARR) of this product

Name: Unit cost
Description: The amount that sold goods cost the HubSpot customer

Name: Discount percentage
Description: The discount percentage applied

Name: Effective unit price
Description: Price that gets applied to this line item when volume tier pricing is used

Name: Margin
Description: The margin value of this product

Name: Annual contract value margin
Description: The margin annual contract value of this product

Name: Annual recurring revenue margin
Description: The margin annual recurring revenue of this product

Name: Monthly recurring revenue margin
Description: The margin monthly recurring revenue of this product

Name: Total contract value margin
Description: The margin total contract value of this product

Name: Monthly recurring revenue
Description: The monthly recurring revenue (MRR) of this product

Name: Net price after tax
Description: Amount of line item after applying tax

Name: Pre discount amount
Description: The pre-discount amount of a line item

Name: Pricing model
Description: Defines the pricing model as either 'flat' or one of three tiered options

Name: Number of payments
Description: Number of payments for the given period on a Line Item

Name: Billing terms
Description: If there are fixed number payments or it goes on until cancelled
Options: Fixed number of payments (FIXED) [READ-ONLY]; Automatically renew until cancelled (AUTOMATICALLY_RENEW) [READ-ONLY]

Name: Tax amount
Description: Amount of tax calculated based on tax rate for this line item

Name: Tax rate
Description: The tax rate used on this line item

Name: Total contract value
Description: The total contract value (TCV) of this product

Name: Calculated total discount
Description: Calculated total Discount for the line item taking in consideration the flat amount and discount percentage.

Name: Unit price
Description: Cost of product

Name: Quantity
Description: How many units of a product are in this line item

Name: Billing frequency
Description: How often a line item with recurring billing is billed. It informs the pricing calculation for deals and quotes. Line items with one-time billing aren’t included.
Options: Weekly (weekly); Every two weeks (biweekly); Monthly (monthly); Quarterly (quarterly); Semi-annually (per_six_months); Annually (annually); Every two years (per_two_years); Every three years (per_three_years); Every four years (per_four_years); Every five years (per_five_years)

Name: Tax
Description: The tax amount applied

Name: Delayed billing start by days
Description: Number of days billing should be delayed by. It allows the customers to start billing sometime in the future

Name: Delayed billing start by months
Description: Number of months billing should be delayed by. It allows the customers to start billing sometime in the future.

Name: Start billing terms
Description: The type of billing start delay. It can be a fixed date in the future, relative delay in number of days or months
Options: Custom Date (hs_recurring_billing_start_date) [READ-ONLY]; Delayed start (days) (hs_billing_start_delay_days) [READ-ONLY]; Delayed start (months) (hs_billing_start_delay_months) [READ-ONLY]

Name: Term
Description: Product recurring billing duration

Name: Billing start date
Description: Recurring billing start date for a line item
